tooltip.sculkhorde.dev_wand:
Right-click to spawn a spore spewer to start world infection.
Right-click + Left-Shift to Show Total Sculk Mass. 
Right-click + Left-Alt to add 100 Sculk Mass.
tooltip.sculkhorde.infestation_purifier:
Right-click to drop back into item.
On death, item does not drop.
An entity that when spawned, removes Sculk Infestation from the area. If it cannot find any more infestation within it's range, it will drop. The Sculk Horde will attack it.
tooltip.sculkhorde.purification_flask_it: Throw at Infestation to clear it up. Clears sculk infection and lure from living things.
tooltip.sculkhorde.custom_item_projectil: This is a dev item to test projectiles. Its the parent class of all projectiles. I decided to add it as an item just for tom foolery
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_acidic_projecti:
An acidic projectile created by a Sculk Spitter.
Has a chance to drop when the projectile hits a block.
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_resin:
A sticky and malleable substance.
Can be obtained from shearing the mature cells of a Sculk Bee Hive structure.
tooltip.sculkhorde.dev_node_spawner: Calls the node spawn procedure at the player's location.
tooltip.sculkhorde.warden_beef: A forbidden food. A dev item that is used to enable in-development features when eaten.
tooltip.sculkhorde.calcite_clump:
A sturdy and bone-like material.
Can be obtained from mining calcite ore from a Sculk Living Rock structure.
tooltip.sculkhorde.calcite_ore:
A sturdy and bone-like material.
Can be obtained from the Sculk Living Rock structure. This structure is most commonly found surrounding Sculk Brain Nodes.
tooltip.sculkhorde.infested_log: A material that deceivingly looks like wood, but is made of a strange, bone-like material.
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_node: A highly sophisticated neural hub found within the Sculk Horde. It acts as a secondary brain for the Sculk Node, facilitating the intricate control of the local Sculk network.
tooltip.sculkhorde.spike:
A sharp and dangerous spike.
Infects all living things that touch it. Immediately breaks upon contact with a non-sculk entity.
tooltip.sculkhorde.tendrils: A vine-like flora that almost feels like flesh.
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_summoner:
A strange and mysterious block that summons Sculk Horde members.
Once alerted, will spawn enemies faster.
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_bee_nest:
A hive-like structure that is home to a colony of Sculk Bees.
Cells underneath it can be harvested for Sculk Resin.
tooltip.sculkhorde.sculk_bee_nest_cell:
A cell that is home to a colony of Sculk Bees.
Can be harvested for Sculk Resin with shears, when mature.
tooltip.sculkhorde.dev_structure_tester: This is a dev block to test structures. It will spawn a structure at the block's location.
tooltip.sculkhorde.infested_crying_obsid: A strange infested block. You can hear the cries of the dead within it. Used to craft Crying Souls.
tooltip.sculkhorde.crying_souls: The souls of the assimilated. They lost their bodies, memories, and personality. The only thing that remains is their anguish. Used to craft Pure Souls.
tooltip.sculkhorde.essence_of_purity: A pure essence that is used to craft purity items. It radiates the warmth of an early sunrise and fills you with a feeling of comfort.
tooltip.sculkhorde.pure_souls: Used to craft Infestation Purifiers and to deactivate the Ancient Sculk Node. Souls of the Assimilated that have been purified. You brought them peace and tranquility.
tooltip.sculkhorde.infestation_ward_bloc: A block that prevents Sculk Infestation from spreading to any of it's neighboring blocks. This includes diagonals.
tooltip.sculkhorde.dev_mass_infectinator: Use at your own risk. A dev block that continuously infects an extremely large area. Made for Karat Feng's unquenchable conquest to infest everything he lays his eyes upon.
